topics.title: Toolkit Overview and Usage Modes
topics.summary: Provide a high-level description of the NiFi Toolkit CLI, its purpose, and execution modes.
topics.research_request: Summarize supported utilities, interactive versus single-command usage, and prerequisites.

topics.title: Command Catalog and Structure
topics.summary: Document the command hierarchy, namespaces, and shared options implemented by the CLI.
topics.research_request: Enumerate command groups, core arguments, and how new commands should be structured.

topics.title: Session and Context Management
topics.summary: Explain how sessions, contexts, and shared options are handled within the CLI runtime.
topics.research_request: Describe lifecycle of CLI sessions, configuration resolution, and context propagation.

topics.title: Registry Automation Commands
topics.summary: Detail CLI commands for interacting with NiFi Registry, including authentication and flow management workflows.
topics.research_request: Explain command usage for bucket management, flow versioning, and credential handling.

topics.title: NiFi Administration Commands
topics.summary: Describe CLI commands focused on NiFi cluster management, process groups, and controller services.
topics.research_request: Document capabilities for managing process groups, reporting tasks, and node operations via the CLI.

topics.title: Configuration and Property Files
topics.summary: Explain how CLI configuration files control authentication, endpoints, and TLS, including default templates.
topics.research_request: Describe property semantics, TLS configuration options, and how operators customize config files.

topics.title: CLI Binaries and Packaging
topics.summary: Detail the launcher scripts, binaries, and packaging layout that ship with the toolkit.
topics.research_request: Explain shell and batch scripts, environment variables, and packaging for the CLI distribution.

topics.title: REST Client Abstractions
topics.summary: Describe the client abstractions used by the CLI to communicate with NiFi and Registry endpoints.
topics.research_request: Explain HTTP client configuration, serialization strategy, and error handling in the CLI.

topics.title: Output and Result Formatting
topics.summary: Explain how CLI results are formatted, including table, JSON, and raw outputs.
topics.research_request: Describe result handlers, formatting options, and customization hooks for CLI output.

topics.title: TLS and Certificate Automation
topics.summary: Detail how the toolkit assists with certificate generation and TLS configuration for NiFi deployments.
topics.research_request: Explain certificate generation commands, keystore management, and integration with NiFi security configuration.
